wikipedia_page.main: James Clarke Hook  (21 November 1819 – 14 April 1907) was an English painter and etcher of marine, genre and historical scenes, and landscapes.

Tiger Bay was released in the UK in June 1994. The original cover art is James Clarke Hook's "Welcome Bonny Boat", doctored to include the band members.http://halfmanhalfbikekit.wordpress.com/2012/08/16/hebden-bridge-14-15-july/
* Peter Mennim - cover painting (after Welcome Bonny Boat by James Clarke Hook)
* James Clarke Hook – Compass'd by the Inviolate Sea

Juliet McMaster was born in Kenya in 1937, and is a descendant of the Victorian painter James Clarke Hook. She earned a Bachelor of Arts in English at St. Anne's College in Oxford. After emigrating to  Canada in 1961, she received her Master's degree and PhD at the University of Alberta, where she was the Faculty of Art's first PhD graduate.
